game.name: Isagi's Bartending Diary
game.shortDescription: This fan game, set in a VA-11 HALL-A alternate universe and centered around the "Isagi x Bachira" pairing from Blue Lock, tells the story of bartender Isagi returning to work at Blue Lock after a three-month leave of absence...
game.shortDescriptionEn: This fan game, set in a VA-11 HALL-A alternate universe and centered around the "Isagi x Bachira" pairing from Blue Lock, tells the story of bartender Isagi returning to work at Blue Lock after a three-month leave of absence...
